data.name: Never gonna give you up
data.description:
``` Let's go back to the 80s when our parents were students like us.```

In this kata you will have to work with the chorus of the wonderful song 

```Never gonna give you up``` by ```Rick Astley```

```
A vector of numbers will be input,
the output will be a vector of chorus lines
```

 Depending on what number will be in the array, you need to 
```insert one stanza```, and ```each even line ```
should have a ```'NEVER GONNA' in capital letters.```

I offer you examples of the program.

Chorus of this song:
```
	Never gonna give you up
	Never gonna let you down
	Never gonna run around and desert you
	Never gonna make you cry
	Never gonna say goodbye
	Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you 
```

``` EXAMPLE:
Input: { 1, 3, 3, 4 }
Output: {
"Never gonna let you down",
"NEVER GONNA make you cry",
"Never gonna make you cry",
"NEVER GONNA say goodbye"
}
```

More examples in the test cases.
Good luck and never give up! :D
